explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated the constructor name to match the enclosing class (ContextMenuMouseListener) and relied on existing fields, enum, and Swing types already declared in the class to ensure successful compilation.
exception_handling: none

refactoring: none
misc: Added @SuppressWarnings("serial") to the constructor to silence serialization warnings generated by the anonymous AbstractAction classes without altering behavior.
